title: Mommy, Can I Have a Cat?
story: Mommy. Can I have a cat? A cat? Why do you want one, Margaret? My friend Betty has one. She has a cat? Yes, and her cat is so cute. You have to take care of it. I know, mom. I'll feed it every day. Okay, Margaret. You'll have a cat.
summary: A young girl named Margaret asks her mom for a cat because her friend Betty has one, and she promises to take good care of it.
image: An illustration of a girl holding a cat and smiling.
